messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Writer's Workspace LXXXVII's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Head of Personnel's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Writer's Workspace LXXXVII, please stand-by.
